sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react"
import styled, { ThemeProvider } from "styled-components"
import Button from "./component/inputs/button/Button"
import Checkbox from "./component/inputs/checkbox/Checkbox"
import Radio from "./component/inputs/radio/Radio"
import Chip from "./component/inputs/chip/Chip"
import Switch from "./component/inputs/swicth/Switch"
import Star from "./component/inputs/rating/Star"
import { white } from 'open-color'
import { Icon16 } from './component/icon/Icon'
import Form from "./component/inputs/form/Form"
import TextInput from "./component/inputs/form/TextInput"
const Wrapper = styled.div`
    width: 360px;
    margin: 30px auto;
`
const theme={
    primary : '#5C7CFA'
}
function onon (e){
    console.log(e)
}

function App () {
    const [chip, setChip] = useState("전체")
    const [activeStar, setActiveStar] = useState(3)
    const stars = [1,2,3,4,5]
    const [toggle, setToggle] = useState("false")
    return(
        <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
            <Wrapper>
                <Button size="large">버어튼</Button>
                <Button>버어튼</Button>
                <Button size="small">버어튼</Button>
            </Wrapper>
            <Wrapper>
                <Button color="warnning">버어튼</Button>
                <Button >버어튼</Button>
                <Button color="mono">버어튼</Button>
                <Button disabled>버어튼</Button>
            </Wrapper>
            <Wrapper>
                <Button color="warnning" outline>버어튼</Button>
                <Button outline>버어튼</Button>
                <Button disabled outline>버어튼</Button>
            </Wrapper>
            <Wrapper>
                <Button shape="square">버어튼</Button>
                <Button>버어튼</Button>
                <Button shape="pill">버어튼</Button>
            </Wrapper>
            <Wrapper>
                <Button fullWidth>
                    <Icon16
                        width="18"
                        height="18"
                        fill={white} 
                        icon="IcoCheck"
                    />
                    확인
                </Button>
                <Button shape="square" fullWidth>버어튼</Button>
                <Button shape="square" fullWidth color="mono" onClick={onon}>확인</Button>
            </Wrapper>
            <Wrapper>
                <Checkbox value="a" onChange={onon}>dd</Checkbox>
                <Checkbox value="b">dd</Checkbox>
                <Checkbox disabled>dddd</Checkbox>
                <Checkbox checked disabled>dddd</Checkbox>
            </Wrapper>
            <Wrapper>
                <Radio value="aa" name="dd" checked onChange={onon}>dd123dd</Radio>
                <Radio value="bb" name="dd" onChange={onon}>ddddddd</Radio>
                <Radio value="cc" name="gg" disabled>ddddddd</Radio>
                <Radio value="dd" name="gg" checked disabled>ddddddd</Radio>
            </Wrapper>
            <Wrapper>
                <Chip 
                    label="전체"
                    selected={chip === "전체"}
                    onClick={() => setChip("전체")}
                />
                <Chip
                    label="상의"
                    selected={chip === "상의"}
                    onClick={() => setChip("상의")}
                />
                <Chip
                    label="하의"
                    selected={chip === "하의"} 
                    onClick={() => setChip("하의")}
                />
            </Wrapper>
            {/* <Wrapper>
                <Rating onClick={onon}/>
            </Wrapper> */}
            <Wrapper>
                { 
                    stars.map(star => (
                        <Star 
                            key={star}
                            active={star < activeStar + 1 && true}
                            onClick={() => setActiveStar(star)}
                            size="32"
                        />
                    ))
                }
            </Wrapper>
            <Wrapper>
                <Switch active={toggle} onClick={() => setToggle(!toggle)}/>
                <Switch active={!toggle} onClick={() => setToggle(!toggle)}/>
                <Switch disabled/>
                <Switch disabled active/>
            </Wrapper>
            <Wrapper>
                <Form label="이름">
                    <TextInput/>
                </Form>
                <Form 
                    label="이름"
                    placeholder="이름을 입력해주세요"
                    name="name"
                    disabled={true}
                />
                <Form 
                    label="이름"
                    placeholder="이름을 입력해주세요"
                    defaultValue="이동국"
                    name="name"
                    helpMessage="dd"
                />
                <Form 
                    label="이름"
                    placeholder="이름을 입력해주세요"
                    defaultValue="이동국"
                    name="name"
                    error={true}
                    errorMessage="dddd"
                />
                <Form 
                    label="이름"
                    placeholder="이름을 입력해주세요"
                    defaultValue="이동국"
                    name="name"
                    error={true}
                    errorMessage="dddd"
                    helpMessage="dd"
                />
            </Wrapper>
        </ThemeProvider>
    )
}

export default App
